targets.expr: max by(pod) (max_over_time(container_start_time_seconds{job="kubelet",pod=~"^job-.+",container!="POD",image!=""}[$__range])) * on(pod) group_left(label_platform_neuromation_io_user) max by(label_platform_neuromation_io_user, pod) (max_over_time(kube_pod_labels{job="kube-state-metrics",label_platform_neuromation_io_user="$user_name"}[$__range]))
